tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
Found his balanced way of combining conventional approach and modern methods very interesting. His focussed and unhurried way in understanding the patient's particular problem and addressing it, offering solutions and sugfestions for treatment was totally heart warming. In short, a doctor 
who doesn't just listen, speak and let you leave but one who engages with  the patient's situation.  God bless.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Very very sharp in understanding the problem.
Very smart to understand the patient and deals deligently.
Convincing diagnosis.
** ******** ******** ******
God has very few people on earth who are special like him.

tags: Wait time,
review:
Very poor time keeping. Appointment was at 8pm and doctor came in at 10pm one time. Second time 8.30pm appointment and doctor came in at 10pm again. And consultation happened at 10.30. 

Very difficult to plan the evening or dinner with this kind of poor time keeping.

Extremely happy and satisfied with the consultation. Very patient and listened to my issues throughly
Offered complete detail about my hip issue, nature of treatment and recovery process
I felt very comfortable and confident **** * *** ***** **** ** *** ** *** ***t

review: He (Dr.K P Kosygan)is given instructions to take scan to the other doctors., at the time of scanning he personally seen the monitor inch by inch ...Great..(before going to the clinic prayed to my God Jesus at that time I have seen my god in all the three doctors)

tags: None
review: I met the Dr with knee dislocation problem in Nov 2016. I had multiple ligument tear, full tear of mpfl, partial tear of acl etc. He was very kind, listened to all my problems and was very optimistic. He said surgery might not be required and giving time by getting pop for 4 weeks should heal it. I was on POP for 4 weeks and now am back to normal activities without any problem. I am very happy to be back to normal without surgery. Thanks Dr.
